title: House of Sand and Fog
writer: Andre Dubus III (novel), Vadim Perelman (screenplay), Shawn Lawrence Otto (screenplay)
actors: Jennifer Connelly, Ben Kingsley, Ron Eldard, Frances Fisher
plot: An abandoned wife is evicted from her house and starts a tragic conflict with her home's new owners.
awards: Nominated for 3 Oscars. Another 12 wins & 37 nominations.
